item.title: Succinct Atomic Swap
item.description: Topic: Succinct Atomic Swap (SAS) Location: Ruben Somsen YouTube channel SAS resources: https://gist.github.com/RubenSomsen/8853a66a64825716f51b409be528355f Intro Happy halvening. Today I have a special technical presentation for you. Basically what we are going to do is cut atomic swaps in half. I call this succinct atomic swaps. Motivation First let me tell you my motivation. I think Bitcoin is a very important technology. We need to find ways to utilize it at its maximum potential without sacrificing decentralization.
